void BtHsProfileService::OnRequestStateChange (  BtRequestType  request_type,
BtRequestState  old_request_state,
BtRequestState  new_request_state
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Response to user initiate Hs disconnect request.

OnRequestStateChange will be automatically called if the Hs disconnect request state changed.

Parameters:
request_type A BtRequestType identify the request type.
old_request_state the old BtRequestState
new_request_state the BtRequestState after the evoking request operation.

Implements BtService.
